name: Flick Music
description: A beautiful music player for Flick with library scanning, playback controls, and lock screen integration.
long_description:
Flick Music is a first-party music player designed specifically for the Flick mobile shell. Features include:

- Automatic music library scanning from ~/Music
- Support for MP3, FLAC, OGG, M4A, WAV, and Opus formats
- Ambient glow UI with smooth animations
- Lock screen media controls
- Background playback
- Progress tracking and seeking
- Auto-advance to next track
